channel.title: Epic bot
channel.description:
EPIC BOT IS UP AND RUNNING!!!!!!!!!!!! BEST RUNESCAPE BOT EVER!
WOW THIS POST IS CRAZY POPULAR!!!! KEEP IT #1 !!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Epic bot
item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

Eh… Why risk it anyways? Bots can get you into trouble a lot.

1: Gotta worry about hacking.
2: Gotta worry about Jagex banning ya.

Also, doing it yourself makes it feel like you’ve achieved something though it isn’t anything important.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic bot
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:80, topic:434201”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=536917.msg3928810#msg3928810 date=1330477156]
HEY GUYS I DON’T THINK YOU’RE TALKING ABOUT EPIC BOT.

I love you all, but please stop. <3
[/quote]

K 3>

epic bot is gay. I don’t understand why it has the be an executable file instead of a .jar file.[/quote]
I think it’s cause they don’t want everyone to find out that they have a RAT in there.
The executable file just prevents of gettin the .jar file directly, but you can still get it if u know how to.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic bot
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:81, topic:434201”]SEMMER DOWN BITCHES.
Are you able to view source code in an .exe file? That could be why so you’re not able to change it but then again I don’t know much about that and you probably can anyways.[/quote]

Pretty sure you can decompile it just the same… Powerbot and RSBuddy were jar files though.

Read full topic
